snippet: In this installment of a new series from the photo editors of T, we examine a set of images, taken mostly during the ’70s and ’80s, that capture everyday life in the industrial town of Wilkes-Barre, Pa.
abstract: In this installment of a new series from the photo editors of T, we examine a set of images, taken mostly during the ’70s and ’80s, that capture everyday life in the industrial town of Wilkes-Barre, Pa.

headline.main: The Secret World of the Photographer Mark Cohen
